pageProps.data:
## SkinTest ###### Description To enhance face/human detection we need an ability to test image for color that match skin color. This operation returns exact the same size image with fully red pixels rgba(255, 0, 0, 1) for pixels that match skin color and black rgba(0, 0, 0, 1) otherwise. ###### Params | Param | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | |**tSrc**|[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)|input image| |**ths?**|Object|thresholds

TODO: Please describe a mask formula in description ([@worldthirteen](https://github.com/worldthirteen))| ###### Example ```js gm.skinTestOp(inputImage); ```
